Name: Free Flemsha
Objective:
You've met a prisoner who calls himself Flemsha. He claims if you free him,
he will offer his alchemical expertise to your cause.
TurnIn:
You have found an old key, it is likely a prison key.
You should return to Flemsha's cell.

Name: Clear some rooms
Objective:

You think killing 5 monsters would make a good impression.
TurnIn: You have killed 5 monsters and should return to Gheed.
